name: Red Lava
description: Red Lava offers a comprehensive Cloud Communications Platform empowering businesses to craft seamless customer journeys across various touchpoints, leveraging OpenAI technology. Our platform facilitates personalized interactions through customers' preferred channels, including WhatsApp, Messenger, Chat, Email, SMS, Push Notifications, and Mobile Wallet. Red Lava provides a resilient hosting solution coupled with a user-friendly messaging API, available for both on-premise and cloud deployment, all at a competitive and scalable price point. Partnering with leading mobile operators, messaging apps, banks, social platforms, tech companies, and aggregators, Red Lava is at the forefront of smart messaging solutions. Our offerings span Customer Contact, Conversational AI powered by OpenAI, and Mobile Marketing, enhanced by an industry-leading Customer Data Platform. Businesses rely on Red Lava for enhanced marketing and sales effectiveness. For inquiries, reach out to info@redlava.in.
focus_areas: Integration of WhatsApp API with platforms such as Salesforce,  HubSpot, Google People API, and Zapier.
WhatsApp Marketing Automation, covering Chat-Automation and Contact Center features, including agent management, supervision.
Implementation of Chatbot AI & GPT technology developed by OpenAI.
